name: Darkest Puzzles
description:
Darkest Puzzles is a puzzle-platformer mini game, in which you have to use the light to your advantage to open the door to the next level.

I made this game as a task from the master's degree in game development I'm in. It's just the first three levels as a simple 2d game tutorial and I want to continue it and make a few more levels on the future. But it's here in stand by for now to keep learning other things.

Art assets:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/simplified-platformer-pack

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-art-extended-enemies
